title: China Punishes Xi'an Officials for Biggest Covid Outbreak Since Wuhan
content:
1. China Punishes Xi'an Officials for Biggest Covid Outbreak Since Wuhan  Bloomberg
  2. China locks down 13 million in Xi'an after COVID-19 outbreak  Al Jazeera English
  3. China puts city of 13 million in lockdown ahead of Olympics  Fox News
  4. This Chinese city found a Covid cluster. All 13 million residents are now under lockdown  CNN
  5. China's Xian locks down its 13 mln residents as COVID-19 cases rise  Reuters

localize.title: 中国、武漢以来の大規模な牛疫発生で西安市職員を処分
中国对西安官员进行处罚，因为这是自武汉以来最大的一次ovid暴发。
中國對西安官員進行處罰，因爲這是自武漢以來最大的一次ovid暴發。
